articles.content: By India Today Information Desk: The Shillong Teer Lottery is a distinctive game played in Meghalaya, where winners are determined based on the number of arrows shot. To check the lucky numbers for t… [+1407 chars]

articles.title: India triumph just the start for improving Bangladesh - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Victorious Bangladesh captain Nigar Sultana wants her players to build on their drought-breaking ODI triumph over India and create more history for the improving side.
